scripts.temporal:worker: cd server && uv run python -m services.temporal.worker
scripts.client:dev: cd client && set NO_COLOR=1&& npm run dev
scripts.python:dev: cd server && uv run uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3010 --reload --reload-dir . --reload-exclude "*.pyc" --reload-exclude "__pycache__" --log-level warning
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p='.env';if(!fs.existsSync(p))fs.copyFileSync('.env.template',p)" && echo '[1/5] Installing root deps...' && npm ci && echo '[2/5] Building client...' && cd client && npm run build && echo '[3/5] Installing Python deps...' && cd ../server && uv venv && uv sync && echo '[4/5] Installing WhatsApp deps...' && cd whatsapp-rpc && npm ci && echo '[5/5] Building WhatsApp server...' && npm run build && echo 'Build complete.'
